posts.post_content:
Hello, I am looking for the following T213-2's.  Looking for low grade - A's, 1's, and 2's.  Graded or raw. Beat up is fine.   Will purchase, or will trade for anything in my eBay store.   

[url]https://www.ebay.com/str/FrenchQuarterCards?_trksid=p2047675.l2563[/url]

Thanks, Rick
